```{r}
#### Workspace setup ####
library(opendatatoronto)
library(dplyr)
library(AER)
library(future)
library(gitcreds)
library(knitr)
library(lintr)
library(renv)
library(reprex)
library(styler)
library(tictoc)
library(tidyverse)
library(tinytex)
library(usethis)

#### Download data ####

# get package
package <- show_package("ac77f532-f18b-427c-905c-4ae87ce69c93")
head(package)

# get all resources for this package
resources <- list_package_resources("ac77f532-f18b-427c-905c-4ae87ce69c93")
head(resources)

# load the first datastore resource as a sample
the_raw_data <- filter(resources, row_number()==1) %>% get_resource()
the_raw_data


#### Save data ####
file.exists("inputs/data/raw_data.csv")
write_csv(
  x = the_raw_data,
  file = "inputs_data_raw_data.csv"
)
````
